column5: shut up and fish old man
He may not be able to spell, but "cutting egde" does cut to the chase....

Not likely. BTW, your arse gets chapped pretty easy doesn't it Spanky ? I find it amazing how you were able to look into your electronic device and determine that I'm old. That must be your super power. Drink up there Spanky, drink up. PjShorthorn
Yes, and don't forget about the fires pushing the Sasquatch south....
Will he make it all the way down to central Indiana? I can't wait to meet him!!!
I carry the flag proudly. PjShorthorn
zzzzzzzzzz that pink bird has gotten old time to put it to bed and leave it there no longer amusing

On a more serious note, and this may be because the last year and a half has made me somewhat crabby, the last thing I think most residents in NW Ontario want to see right now is out of country license plates heading into the bush to go camping.

Thanks for the come back.. At this time of year I'm looking at the Gogama area above Sudury.Been going there for July 30 years..I respect you about the forest fires.. I go to Pickle Lake area in spring. Also not a camp fire guy.Always take small stove Thanks again Paul

I could explain it to you ( which I won’t), but I can’t make you understand it ( which I know you can’t) I can teach you how to write a proper sentence, but that would be a waste of your time and mine. PjShorthorn
I wonder if this will be required next year.
The precedent has been set.
Hope I'm alive to find out!

I just downloaded the Arrive Canada App. There is a test that specifically states that traveling to Canada for fishing is excluded even if you have a Vax and Negative test.Check it out:https://www.canada.ca/en/public-heal...arrivecan.html
Didn't somebody say you had to use the app within 3 days of entry? If so maybe the app will be amended on August 6th?
Maybe, but I just downloaded the app where the link was included in a news story today. We shall see.
Thats the LAST thing Canada needs... a bunch of walleye swimming around with Covid!
At the bottom of the web page that it states no entry for fishing it is dated 5/17/21. I am sure they will change the app settings and wording on or before the entry date.
You have to wait to submit your information so that it falls within the 72 hours of your arrival. At least that is my understanding. PjShorthorn
if you click on the "Find out if you can enter Canada link" it clears all this up. discretionary travel ok for US citizens after August 9. phish
Don't expect to be able to do this for a couple weeks still. 3 days before the trip
Are we going to be able to tent camp in the bush? Paul
Depending on what area you go to no fires in the bush. N/W Ontario is burning up, not a good time to be camping up this way.
